name: Without Within
description: The (mis)adventures of Vinty, a nobody who thinks she's somebody!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP or above Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 960 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The Goods
You can read this novel in just about 5 minutes, but I honestly enyoyed every second of it.   InvertMouse, Keep it up the hard work!
+Good animation. +funny story. +FREE, SON!  -Wish Vinty was my waifu. -Too short. -Not as good as Cory in da house. 7.8/7.9 recommended for people who like darksouls.
and so i decided to download and give this a try. Its great. But the ending. You have to find out for yourself. She never opened her eyes.  Its free so why not.
Triangle mouth. Illuminati confirmed.  10/10
This game is really short but if you have 20 minutes to waste you can give it a try.

a short but very enjoyable free visual novel which will have you fall in love with vinty (the main character) and it shows her everyday struggles in live.  being free but also very short - about 30 - 40 minutes i thought i'd love to see her some more which you can in without with in 2 (which is not free £3.99) - which is fair as the people involed in the company behind the without with in series have bills as well  all in all it has a nice, short story - great art - great music - 4.5/5
This game was rather short, but it was well worth my time. The art style was wonderful and the story kept a smile on my face. Without Within is extremely adorable with a soft touch of emotion.
A miserable girl with a short story and a funny ending. Art is good and so is the story

My overall rating for Without Within: 95/100  This visual novel is very cute, I think it deserves its chance. Made by small team of developers, yet it still has humour, wishes, expectations and all emotions, which are present in our lives. Lets see in detail this short lovely game.  GAMEPLAY  + Cute animations + Good story design - Short time - Fullscreen is clunky  Animations and story was perfect. There were choices, I think my most favourite part was playing the Sunflower War (that joke was hilarious, I like, when authors are able to make fun of themselves).   Only negatives were a little short time and fullscreen resolution is not optimized well. But this negatives are just a small scratch on a perfect facade of the game.  CHARACTERS  + Vinty + Good actions are rewarded  I think everyone of us is a bit similar to Vinty. We desire for success, fame and respect, but we have to fight our everyday struggles. I like, that when I gave a chance to good action, I got rewarded. Thanks!  VISUALS  + Decent  By the visual side, game has no faults. Enjoyable, childish shoujo style. Suits this title well.  SOUNDTRACK  + Limited, yet fine  There are only few tracks, but they complete and enhance the atmosphere. Good work, even better, than some big studios.  SUMMARY  Without Within is a humble title, that deserves its score. Made by a small team, perfect idea from Invetmouse, other members did well too! Do you want to live one day as an artist or calligrapher? Well, here is your chance.  Strongly recommended.

The story line was good and the graphics to the story were well matched with the scene. this game is pretty well made. I hope you extend the story a bit more because the story was easy to predict and was short.

Just finished this short, simple, but lovely VN.  The choices I made along my first playthrough turned to be the correct ones, but it's not something hard to achieve if you're not easily angered, or if you're not an  'I complain about things, then do nothing, becasue it's others fault, not mine of course'  person. I'm making too much out of it in fact. Just try every option.  So I tried the other options after successfully finishing the game.  The 'bad endings' felt a little rushed to me, and the real ending unfinished. But not less enjoyable because of it.  In fact the game has some good points of 'working-class/everyday/easy-to-understand' philosophy.  'Simple thoughts, nothing really new or that profound'  you could say about it, but are the simplest, most quotidian things the ones we pay less attention to, the ones we forget with ease. Quoting some lines from the game,  'I had forgotten the last time I found joy in [whatever you love doing]. (...) All I obsessed over was how much, or rather how little, people paid attention to my efforts.'  I ask to you, fellow reader, Have you ever forgot about the purpose on doing what you love to do?  No need to answer me in a comment, just answer yourself.  As a response to the negative reviews I've read, I quote something from the game again, 'I had every intention of tossing this game aside. I kept demanding excitement without offering an ounce of passion in return.  If I played my part, I might be able to discover so much more. '  It's short? Yes. It feels incomplete? It does. But it delivers a simple yet charming story, and the dev announces  here  that more of Vinty's adventures are planned for the future, along with some kind apologies about the game's length.  I almost forgot commenting, the soundtrack is cute, and it goes very well with the rest of the game.  I also found myself related to Vinty when she   buys the game just because how the shop's employee was gazing at her   lol.  I hope this review has been useful.  For the dev team, thanks for making this nice and lovely VN.

This is a very short(~20 minutes) visual novel.   Pros: -Funny/amusing -Short  Cons: -Short(whether this is a pro or a con really depends on how much time you want to spend) -Ending is a bit abrupt, though I think it fits the visual novel  I think the art is sort of cute, but I was a bit disappointed because I felt this visual novel had a lot of missed potential. It could have been better if it was longer imo. This VN is nothing amazing. Still, it's free and short. Considering this, can't really complain too much. If you're looking for something similar to this, you may want to check out 'The Cute, Light and Fluffy Project'.

This is a heartwarming and hilarious story about a young upcoming caligrapher with dreams of becoming famous. The music is enriching and it works to bring out your deepest emotions I often found myself crying stuck in the deepest abyss of emotion. The atmosphere of the game is only enhanced by the fantastic automatic voice over setting which only really brings the charactors and setting to life. This is a modern masterpiece which promises hours apon hours of exciting gameplay and thrilling emotional endings. If you wish to play a truly great game without within is the choice for you. 10/10

the game is free to play and takes very little time to complete; it took me personaly 25 minutes to find all of the endings so the game takes no money and very little time so the question is, is it worth it to take a couple of minutes out of your day to play this and the answer is yes the artwork is cute/enjoyable and the story whilst simple did make me smile so yes if you are are a fan of visual novels i would recomend this. Appaently there is a sequal planned so we will have to see just where they can take this further i for one am looking forward to it.
Very inspiring and very positive. I adore this game so much and you should all check it out.

This game can best be described as a short, but pleasant visual novel that is quite light-hearted and has a rather relateable story and protagonist. The game itself can be completed in, at most, a single hour (probably quicker, but I was live-streaming it when I played it). The art-style and music are all very nice (I really enjoy the title menu's music). Overall, the writting feels very natural and casual (there were a couple of areas that I thought sounded a little odd, but it wasn't anything large and is likely just me).  The only real negative I can say is that the ending is extremely abrupt and that there really is only one 'good' ending. You get a few situations where you have to make a choice between two options, and only one of them will actually progress the plot, as where the other will lead to a 'bad' ending immediately. Other than that, I don't have any real complaints for this game.  It's short and sweet, which is likely what it set out to be, and it's free. Definetly worth a playthrough on a rainy afternoon or a stay-at-home night.

For the first time in a long time I got really into a story I was loving it and then it just ended which upset me a lot but hey it's free so I can't complain I would love to see more of the story though.

Pretty decent, very short VN with only 1 good ending. I think I went through all of the other endings before getting the good one, and the good one wasn't that great, but it was short and interesting.
Cute Game, Lots of bad and good ends :) Only takes about 15min but thats ok for a f2p game. I like it! :D <3 nyaaaaaa
LOL. I didn't know what to expect when I first downloaded it XD Felt a lil' suspicious that a visual novel that looks somewhat nice is free but I can see why now! Short and humorous haha!

Cute stories for the children.. Wish it was longer though. Certain scenes can be much longer and much more happening. Felt like everything was rushing to the end. Would be nice if we can interact with the room using the character.

Pretty cute, short story about a girl pursuing her dreams.  The art is pretty cute. Not much details in the BG but the characters are drawn nicely~ The music is also nice and simple. I find it pretty relaxing to listen to.  The story itself is a pretty nice read. Its short and the game is free so you can read it whenever (~10 mins to hit all endings). There is only one true ending and the rest are bad endings (which are also quite interesting to read xD). Like other reviewers I wouldn't mind if the game was a bit longer, but the story still has a nice stopping point.  Punching the troll was most satisfying~
I liked the story of the game, and I ended up replaying the VN a couple of times just to check out different endings. It's pretty short but it's free. I suggest you try it out.
The game is not bad at all... A little shorter than i expected but it sure got me a lot of laughs, and it's free so it's worth playing it.
So damn short, r8 8/8 so good, was funny for like, idk. I has fun speeding through dis. Still better story den sakura spiritz k. also, its free sooooooo yeh
Game was short but pretty good. I'll probably end up buying the DLC. The art style was cute; The way VInty was drawn reminded me of Konata from Lucky Star.
This game made my realised how tough real life can be but aswell how good it can be sure the story was short but it was a really nice story for me 10/10
Pretty good visual novel with a good theme. The ending was rather...suprising. I still like Japanese Visual Novels better.  Hope Without Within 2 comes out soon.
A cute and short game, something i don't often see and hope you make a sequel.

Beat this game on my second try. This game brought smiles to my face with the amazing artwork and the writing of the game. But more importantly the great music held in the game. The game has the right music in its game. Upbeat when it needs to and at times of failure it is sad but still with a tempo of upbeat. I really do recommend this game to everyone looking for a great story dispite how short the game is.
Best short game ever! Worth the few second download!
Short but fun I had fun playing it :)
Best short game ever! Worth the few second download!
Cool,Short,great,good graphics love it the story too but i wanted a better and than that xD

Vinty has a really quirky personality, and she seems like the kind of person who could outburst over anything. I played through all endings in half an hour, but it was a half hour well spent. Though, the good ending doesn't seem as good as it could be. Maybe show Vinty a few months later in a better apartment, or even show her with some friends. She seems like a loner from the way this game only shows her interacting with less than a handful of people. Princess Aria doesn't even sound that fun anyway! I really liked the story of Vinty working from paycheck to paycheck. She didn't get recognition for her work, but she didn't give up. I only wish there was an illustration of Vinty punching the guy eating the chicken if you chose to do that. ^-^
Sensational. Sets a new standard for the first person shooter genre. Every mistake is punished with painful, unrelenting death. It's like Dark Souls but harder.
'Triangle mouth at 0:07 , Illuminati '  XD
A short, but fantastic game. Vinty trying to carve out a life as a caligrapher, and finding her passion again. 10/10 Kawaii

Game is decent. At least it's free instead of having a price tag attached to it since it reminds me of early newgrounds flash games.   Decent writing, cutesy art and music that sounds royalty-free.   I'll give this a 6/10.

I loved this game, even though it's small as most people say, it's a hell of a ride, with tricky questions where you have to put your humanity in front of everything else. I had loads of fun playing this game, and it openned a new concept of gaming for myself, since it was the first visual novel I've ever played. I took the risk of trusting in the reviews and I dont regret the time I spent playing this game, it's surely worth your time, so what are you waiting for? Go try it out, NOW!!!!!
shortest vn in steam...you can play all play thru in 5 minutes!

I loved every second of this game! It had such an adorable story and you couldnt help but be attatched to vinty. The art style showed proffesionalism and looked incredible and showed that the team behind this reaaly did mean to make a great short game. i would reccomend this game to anyone who likes short story novel games and I thoughrly enjoyed playing it! This game reminded me that any one can become famous and make their dreams come true all it needs is a spark of imagination and inspiration!  10/10
A great game with a great message. Until the end.
I honestly really enjoyed this.

This is my totally honest opinion. The game Without Within, is at best, half a game. What is there, is relatively good, however, the nature of this game was so forceful in demanding you make it's 'right' choices, that you are represented with a fail state, if you do not follow the games linear story.  The fail state is badly made, and deserves a retry segment button, so I don't have to go all the way to the start again, because the Load/Save system is usesless here.  I'd say it's a good start, especially due to it's stunning visuals, and good music, but all up it felt EXTREMELY lacking.  If, you make another game, I'd reccommend adding the following: Multiple choice that MATTERS Different endings A retry last checkpoint/choice button for the fail state More stills, and movement within them More than a singular character Extra songs And most importantly? Something that isn't a sequel.    If you do the above or even a measely quarter of it, you'll be more likely to gain more followers in the future, and I'd be more than happy, to try whatever new game you make. I wish you luck for the future!
Very short but worth it.
great game, played with my sister and had lots of fun 10/10 XD awesome

This game is even shorter than I expected. I understand the development team is small, but it took me maybe 10 minutes to finish the route that didn't go to a 'Bad end' and I was convinced the game had glitched out and ended everything early. I took 7 more minutes to read through the results of other choices, but they all end the game in about 10 lines if you choose them. Heck, one of the bad ends is almost exactly like the true end.   I'm fine with games made by small teams, but seriously, reuse some art assets and give me more to go on than 15 minutes or so of game that ends in some sort of bad end every single time. Also, it's fine to give the girl a fantasy, but could we have at least a tiny indication that she realizes her fantasy of being an INSANELY famous calligrapher is a little bit overblown? As it stands, I ended up thinking her relationship with reality was a bit...tenuous.
Verry good, for few minutes play.

This is a really cute and beautifully executed game. It's very short, but it makes up for length with giggle-inducing scenes and heartwarming moments that we can all relate to. The artwork is quite beautiful in my opinion, and though predictable, the game paths are very cute and noteworthy.
what the hell i'm just playin
Make me smile :) this visual novel is cute since its about a girl's dream and her deeds haha. I must be a good person...not

I love the game. I think it is really funny, and it's worth to play it. The last part was my favourite,I would love to continue read the story but then I saw ' Thanks for playing ' and I didn't saw any ' Bad End'... I want to read more so much XD

*I actually looked up Japanese calligraphy because of this game, and they do look nice.  Pro - Enjoyable Artwork - Good UI - Themes (Patience is a Virtue, Kindness is Repaid With Kindness, ETC) - Short  Con - Short - Questionable Ending

Extremely short, it can be completed in 20-30 minutes even if you want to see all possible paths. But the graphic style is pretty good, music is ok and the plot is pretty good one. Only drawback is the fact that there is only one path to vicotry. You need either to choose the right answer or you get bad end.   I would gladly pay some small sum for it and play part 2.
this touched me in two ways....
not the best, but it's a time waster
I was happy just for playing it, very good game.

It's free and short with a quirky art style. It doesn't take up much room and you can get rid of it after. That's my positive take on this.  Why am I not willing to recommend it?  - Vinty (the protagonist) is an insufferable brat.  - The story is juvenile, boring, and appeared to have little point. - I believe the game tried to be amusing as well as drawing on Internet/gaming culture but this ultimately felt forced. - There was no depth and so its short span suffers rather than swiftly inspires. - The first playthrough did not excite me at all and meant I had no desire to see different branching routes.   Maybe you'll enjoy it. Since you don't have to pay, I suppose you won't lose much by trying it. It doesn't make me want to purchase the sequel.
Great short story, dont expect to PLAY anything though. Nevertheless i enjoyed it very much ty!

Very short and very limited. Of course the game is free, but it's not worth the time. There's only one story path to choose, and you get the equivilent of a 'game over' for picking the wrong of only two options. There isn't much of a story and the game is pretty much a girl feeling sorry for herself.

Its not bad i had no idea what i was going into and to my surprise it was one type of games i love if you love to read and make choices the game is for you its not to long but hopefully there will be more soon i cant wait but good for price FREE xD but yea its a good game and really intresting but anyways i recomend it if you like that type of games
Huh? Trying all the 'choices' leads to nothing but dubious endings. Don't waste your limited time.

If you wanted to find a somewhat dank meme AND a short story AT THE SAME TIME, WELL WE HAVE THE GAME FOR YOU!!! Dis gaim starts out like a normal visual novel, but at the end (if you don't get bad end) you are greeted to a video on youtube that is dank, MLG, and confirms the Illuminati.  I r8 8/8, would play again.
Although it is quite a short visual novel, I still find this rather a heart warming.

I've never been as emotionally shaken in a game. This is beautiful. The art is pretty good and the story is very good too. You get attached to it in seconds, you feel like how she felt. I recommend this game to be played.
Although it is quite a short visual novel, I still find this rather a heart warming.
I just couldn't get into this one.

It was a visual novel, probably. There was a simple story that I actually didn't mind spending the 5 minutes on, but it feels like as though it ended in the wrong place. If you have about 5 minutes to spare or 10 if you are a slow reader, this might not be a bad place to put your time, otherwise, this visual novel isn't really that interesting.
'TRIANGLE MOUTH AT 0:07. ILLUMINATI CONFIRMED'  1337/10

Very! very! short visual novel. Make a choice of 1 of 2 options available, on which direction the story takes & it's over in less than 5mins. The ending is nothing to get exited about. I would like to have given a Yes/No choice for the recommendation Yes as it free & somthing to do on a short coffee break, like the art style / No as there's no depth, to short & feel youv'e missed something in the game. Unsure why it's on Steam? I love Indi developers & have purchased & played some great emotional story driven game.
10/10 would kill myself again
One 'bad' answer and it’s game over and restart from the beginning… Also, not fun.
Arr i love this tiny cute game ^_^

To be honest, this was a big letdown. Extremely short, sub-par humor, sub-par writing (It looks like something you'd see in a 14 year old's fanfiction), etc etc. The art was okay, but in no way memorable or unique. The only redeemable feature about this is that it was free (and I can see why).
This game is literally the worst thing ever 0/10 IGN
I was waiting for the hentai part.  It never came.  So did I.  0/10
Then art design is amazing! I love it and continue loving this X3

We broke the 4th wall,everybody (you'll understand what i mean after you finished the game) However.... Nice game,has good grammar and the choices are obvious,but i always picked the wrong one first so i could see what'd happen,now i wonder,there will be a part two? i be like: wow m8,dis game is gr8,m8,i r8 8/8
It's short and free but its actually funny and I had some good laughs out of it
i have no words
Cute art. Free. Short. What do you want more?
It's free, short, and lighthearted.   What more could you want?
Charming and sweet. It's a cute, albeit short visaul novel that I would love to see more of.
a very funny and stupid novel. it takes only 20 minutes for the full content and it is hilarious. would recommend for a quick fixer-upper.

Positive :  Good art, everything seems as good as it is with such a manga style The story quite enjoyable  Negative :  The answer is pretty straight, just pick a good response and you'll end up with a good ending, pick a wrong one, you'll get a bad end, i hope it could be more twisting The sound effect when you click the main menu it's a bit sharp, like the sound of 8-bit nintendo games, maybe only me, but it's disturbing when you hear it in a high volume  Nonetheless, this game worth to be played
This game is shorter than TV ads.   Recommended because still better than watching TV ads.

A hesitant recommendation. It's super short, but it's free so I can't really complain about it's length. It was cute for the extremely short amounnt of time that it lasted and I enjoyed the art style and decision making. Should this ever cost money, however, I could not recommend it for more than like a dollar (and that's pushing it).
It's simple and quite quick, but it is enjoyable Visual Novel to play. The art is pretty and i'm hoping for a sequel. Try it, its pretty awesome.
this was one of the best indie games ive played but whats even more suprising is that it was made by 4people!!!!  invertmouse did a really good job with this game 10/10 would experiance again

Without within is a short VN with a more real life approach to story telling with regards to actions and consequences the chibi art is a nice touch however id like to see more content in the next release would recommend,

Played every possible sequence of choices in the VN in less than an hour. Yes, i'ts that short! Is that a bad thing? Not really. It's funny to read and the actions you should choose to proceed are rather obvious. If it wasn't as funny as it is, i wouldn't have bothered checking out the other possibilities. Convincing argument: If you have time to read comments, you have time to play it.
VERY short visual novel, but one to check out if you have 10-20 minutes to spare. Relatable to most people.
great short game many paths to go

Worth the price paid. Not to say that it's a terrible game- just that it's an extremely short one. I liked the main character, and for what it is, it's worth the (very small) amount of time invested in it. The character of Vinty is quite enjoyable to read, and I believe all of us have at least a little Vinty in us. The good ending surprised me, but after the initial surprise wore off, I was pleased with it. It breaks the 'traditional' ending of these types of stories. Don't go in expecting anything great. If you're looking for a light, fun and mildly thought-provoking game too kill some time, then this is the perfect choice.
A 20 minute experience where I learnt that all pay rent ladies (or whatever their name is) are ebil and will kick you out if you dont get out of bed to answer them.  Life philosophy: 100/10
without the DLC, this game story is just too short, and easy to predict the bad ending but idk if the DLC will make it different or not
Shorter than I expected, and also kinda depressing, but fun to play as well :3
It's a short visual novel with lots of charm, great illustrations, and multiple, albeit short, story paths.
Fun game, its free!  Also don forget the wub
Lost it at triangle mouth  Too bad, it's so short, wish it was longer.
it was really fun playing this game. XD lol its a short story game but i liked it
Cute and short visual novel, read it, it's free!
Good and short, the lack of voice acting and length goes out the window since it is Free to Play, it's a good Visual Novel and would recommend if you like the genre.
A sweet little story, really a good thing to have to help cheer yourself up when things are going bad. I enjoyed it :D

To make it brief, WIthout WIthin is a very fun and interesting Visual Novel that i would recomend to anyone with 10 minutes to spare. Definitly worth a try and i hope they come out with more content.  Go ahead its completely worth it.
triangle mouth , iloominoty confirmed!!!!111!!     triangle / 3 would vinty  vinty is luv vinty is lyf vinty best waifu
This game is a good work in progress... unless it's done O.O
Great VN but short. Still its worth to play.
Vinty, why did it end too soon ;(
10/10 still better than Depression Quest
I Rate this a 10/10 just cause of miss Vinty.
10/10 I punched a fat guy holding a bucket of chicken. :3
-stay in bed -BAD END  100000000/10 BEST GAME EVER!
'Triangle mouth at 0:07. ILLUMINATI!!'

I loved this short story all the way to the end it is just a shame that it ended to quickly... I could honeslty see this as a full manga or just even a much longer interactive story. for the fun and light hearted story that brightened my day 10/10
I love this game!! It was really good I just wish it was longer. *-* I definitely recommend it!
nice little, good narrive, and short so if you have like 10 to 20 min on hand play it is fun

Without Within is a very short game with few decisions and an abrupt ending. BUT, its narrative style is rather charming, as is the artwork, and I had more than a few chuckles while playing it. It may also serve as a good introduction to visual novels for those unfamiliar with the genre. And on top of all that, it's free. What more do you want?

Without Within is a pretty intresting game to play.   What I liked about it was the choices you had to make to recieve the mulitple endings. I also liked the humor, and the graphics that was added to it. It's got great art work, and it's got a great story to tell.   What I disliked about the game was, it was too short. I mean there could have been some minigames in some scenes. Like Vinty's job, helping the kid find his mom, and posting her calligraphy on walls or try handing them out to people who would buy them.   But all in all this is a good game, and I highly recommend it.
oh how i despise trolls so much. It's short, it gives you a little giggles, and overall the art is good. 3.1416/3.1417 I liked the Unhack easter egg/cameo?

This is very nice, 20 minutes was my total playthrough. I would also love to see more, but it was worth the play as it is. Note, the update posted yesterday says that there will, indeed, be more Without Within :)  I got the good ending first time, there's a very simple flow through the game. No real complexity, but hey it was designed as a cool short game and it is.  I definitely recommend it and I see a ton of potential for this if it was also released in a longer version, even if it cost money!
Very clever short story, funny and the moral makes a nice point. Perfect for those times when you need a feel good story and a coffee.
I joined the Dubstep Illuminati. 10/10
This is an adorablely cute game. It obviously was worked hard on. I reccomend this, even if it is rather short. It was cute and fun and I liked it.
Wait this game got a sequel......... wut?!
This game is the cutest thing ever. And it's free. If you don't get it you're a monster.

This is a good example of free VN. It's short but has a neat story with some enjoyable words. The character is ok and you can see her in the screenshots before playing if you want to judge first. The choice in the game matters but not so much in the end. It's not the end but the process to the end that we play as the most part of the game. It'll add some sweet taste in your little free time.

This really short VN(barely 15 minutes?) stays in reality. The true and harsh one. Well, not like there's some other 'better' reality.    I heartfully smiled at the ingenious 4th wall breaks :)    A really nice quote from the novel -  'The happiness they felt when working on the project poured out of every line in this game. I could gaze right into their hearts. Heart. The thing I had long neglected.'
This game is very funny! all of the endings were unpredictable... poor Vinty :')

For a free-to-play, this is actually pretty good! The art is nice, the soundtrack is alright, and the plot makes you smile. Only bad thing is that there's no replay value, since you can only take one 'right' route. One wrong choice and you immediately get a bad ending. Would've been nice to see it branch out a bit, but honestly, for a free game it's really good. If you have 10 minutes, definitely check it out.
Sweet but very short.
Way too short... But cute.
IT IS AMAZING
